subject: Olympic Games (2024)
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Boston, which was chosen Thursday as the American bid city for the 2024 Olympics, is relying heavily on using the existing facilities at many of the region’s dozens of colleges and universities.
snippet: Boston, which was chosen Thursday as the American bid city for the 2024 Olympics, is relying heavily on using the existing facilities at many of the region’s dozens of colleges and universities.
